org.takes.rq

Class RqMethod.Base

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.takes.rq.RqWrap
      • org.takes.rq.RqMethod.Base
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Request, RqMethod
    Enclosing interface:
    RqMethod

    public static final class RqMethod.Base
extends RqWrap
implements RqMethod
    Request decorator, for HTTP method parsing.

    The class is immutable and thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.13.7
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Dmitry Zaytsev (dmitry.zaytsev@gmail.com)
